branchCategory.name: Check Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>Check valves block the flow of fluid in one direction while permitting flow in the other.&nbsp; This prevention of back flow can be an integral part of a circuit to maintain pressure, hold actuator postion or protect devices from reverse flow.&nbsp; Simple check valves only permit flow in one direction while pilot operated check valves can permit reverse flow when released via a pilot signal.&nbsp; All SMC check valves feature low cracking pressure in the normal flow direction.</p>

branchItem.name: Standard Check Valve
branchItem.description: <p>Standard SMC check valves are available in both threaded and One-touch configurations to create a uni-directional flow path.&nbsp; Threaded models are available up to 1" size and 725 psi (5.0 MPa) operating pressure.&nbsp; One-touch models can accommodate tubing from 5/32"/4mm to 12mm or 1/2"</p>

branchItem.name: Pilot Check Valve
branchItem.description: <p>SMC pilot check valves permit flow in one direction and only allow reverse flow if supplied with an appropriate pilot signal.&nbsp; They are available in thread sizes up to 1", and many configurations integrate One-touch connections for installation convenience.&nbsp; The several ASP series models integrate a speed control function for additional versatility.</p>
